product_description: Conquer your sunny days in these shapely denim shorts designed with feathery fringed hems for a little edge.
product_details_and_care:
Conquer your sunny days in these shapely denim shorts designed with feathery fringed hems for a little edge.
4" inseam; 24" leg opening; 12" front rise; 16" back rise (size 8)
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
77% cotton, 7% recycled cotton, 11% modal, 9% elasterell-p, 1% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
